alert.note: Alert for Paulding; Putnam; Van Wert (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 25 at 9:21PM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Blackford, southern Adams, Jay, west central Putnam, southeastern Paulding and Van Wert Counties through 1015 PM EDT... At 919 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Convoy to near Geneva to near Hartford City. Movement was southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Geneva around 925 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Dunkirk, Van Wert, Portland and Redkey. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
